mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3060KagoKetteiShukei" ( "hdrToriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hdrRirekiNo" smallint, "hdrShoHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hdrShoHokenshaMei" character(40), "sakuseiYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "kaigoKyufuhiKensu" integer, "kaigoKyufuhiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kaigoKyufuhiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "kogakuServicehiKensu" integer, "kogakuServicehiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kogakuServicehiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiKensu" integer, "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "hdrTorikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hokenshaMei" character(40) )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3061KagoKetteiMeisai" ( "toriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "rirekiNo" smallint, "renban" smallint, "jigyoshoNo" rgdb."DbUDD004JigyoshaNo", "jigyoshoMei" character(40), "kohiFutanshaNo" character(40), "kohiJukyushaNo" character(40), "kohiShokisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "serviceShuruiCode" rgdb."DbUDD005ServiceShuruiCode", "serviceShuruiName" character(40), "kagomoushitateJiyuCode" rshare."UDD035Code", "kagomoushitateJiyu" character(40), "tanisu" numeric(13,0), "hokenshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "torikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM" )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0001Hihokensha" ( "meisaiRenban" smallint, "shoHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "orgHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "orgHihokenshaKanaShimei" character(40), "orgHihokenshaShimei" character(40), "oldShichosonCode" rshare."UDD023LasdecCode", "henkanHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "shichosonCode" rshare."UDD023LasdecCode", "KannaiKangaiKubun" character(40), "yubinNo" character(40), "choikiCode" character(40), "gyoseikuCode" character(40), "gyoseikuMei" character(40), "jusho" character(40), "banchi" character(40), "katagaki" character(40), "kanaMeisho" character(40), "meisho" character(40), "shimei50onKana" character(40), "shikibetsuCode" character(40), "shikakuShutokuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" character(2), "shikakuSoshitsuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" character(2), "setaiShuyakuNo" character(40) )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" ( "errorKubun" character(40), "shoHokanehshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "key1" character(40), "key2" character(40), "key3" character(40), "key4" character(40), "key5" character(40), "hihokenshaKanaShimei" character(40), "hihokenshaShimei" character(40), "biko" character(40), )

insert.id: 過誤決定集計一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rgdb."DbWT3060KagoKetteiShukeiTemp" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{作成年月日}, #{介護給付費件数}, #{介護給付費単位数}, #{介護給付費保険者負担額}, #{高額介護サービス費件数}, #{高額介護サービス費単位数}, #{高額介護サービス費保険者負担額}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等件数}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等費用額}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等保険者負担額}, #{取込年月}, #{保険者番号}, #{保険者名})

insert.id: 過誤決定明細一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rgdb."DbWT3061KagoKetteiMeisaiTemp" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{連番}, #{事業所番号}, #{事業所名}, #{公費負担者番号}, #{公費受給者番号}, #{公費証記載保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{サービス種類コード}, #{サービス種類名}, #{過誤申立事由コード}, #{過誤申立事由}, #{単位数}, #{保険者負担額}, #{取込年月})

INSERT INTO rgdb."DbWT0001HihokenshaTemp" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月末日}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{旧市町村コード}, #{変換被保険者番号}, #{登録被保険者番号}, #{市町村コード}, #{管内管外区分}, #{郵便番号}, #{町域コード}, #{行政区コード}, #{行政区名}, #{住所}, #{番地}, #{方書}, #{宛名カナ名称}, #{宛名名称}, #{氏名50音カナ}, #{資格取得日}, #{資格取得事由コード}, #{資格喪失日}, #{資格喪失事由コード}, #{世帯集約番号}, #{識別コード} )

insert.id: 処理結果リスト一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rgdb."DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiErrorTemp" VALUES ( #{エラー区分}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{キー1}, #{キー2}, #{キー3}, #{キー4}, #{キー5}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{備考} )
